class Employee extends Person {
	get name () {
		return [this.firstname, this.surname];
	}
	set name (name) {
		var parts = name.split(" ");
		this.firstname = parts[0];
		this.surname = parts[1];
	}
}
/**************************************************/
class Employee extends Person{get name(){return [this.firstname,this.surname];}set name(name){var parts=name.split(" ");this.firstname=parts[0];this.surname=parts[1];}}
/**************************************************/
class Employee extends Person
{
	get name (  )
	{
		return [this.firstname, this.surname];
	}
	set name ( name )
	{
		var parts = name.split( " " );
		this.firstname = parts[0];
		this.surname = parts[1];
	}
}
